body.name: 21" Set of 2 Touch Control Table Lamps with 2 USB & AC Outlets, 3-Way Dimmable Modern Nightstand Lamps for Bedroom Living Room Office Reading, Gray Shade Bedside Lamps, 5000K LED Bulbs Included
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 11 hrs 12 mins
features: ❤【Set of 2 3-Way Dimmable Touch Bedside Lamp】The dimmable touch lamp has 3 levels of brightness. (Low, Medium, High)，allowing you to adjust the brightness of the light. simply tap any metal part of the nightstand lamps to switch settings from low to bright, so you don't have to fumble around for a switch in the middle of the night

❤️【Eye-caring & Children Protection】: This touch table lamp features an easy-to-install, all-in-one natural gray linen hand-crafted lampshade. It minimizes direct eye contact, safeguarding your eyes against strain and fatigue. The lamp's weighted base with a non-slip mat and sturdy design ensures safety around children and pets, as it is less prone to falling down, providing reliable stability and peace of mind.

❤️【Excellent USB A+C Charging Ports & AC Outlet】Do you ever struggle to find a charging socket in the dark of night? This modern table lamp for the bedroom is equipped with fast-charging USB A, USB C ports (5V/2.1A), and an AC outlet (120V), allowing you to charge up to three devices simultaneously. Use it quickly to power up your phone, iPad, earphones, Kindle, laptop, and other electronics - even when the bedside lamps are turned off.

❤️【2 Energy-Saving LED Daylight Bulbs Included】: This bedroom lamp comes with two dimmable LED bulbs, 6W (60W Equivalent), saving up to 90% energy to reduce electricity costs. With 800 lumens and 5000K natural light, these bulbs have a 25,000+ hour lifespan, eliminating the need to purchase extra bulbs. Give stable, soft lighting without flicker or glare, protecting your eyes.

❤️【No Worry to Purchase】―We proudly stand behind all of our products 100%, which is why we offer a full 36-month warranty. If your nightstand lamp has any defect or stops working within 3 years, we help you troubleshoot or send a whole new product. ( If you have any problems with our desk lamp, please CONTACT US via the Amazon message box, and we will reply within 24 hours).

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Why Choose Our Modern Dimmable Table Lamp? Choose Us for Quality, Style, and Safety. Our modern set of two table lamps is a touch control switch enabled, allowing you to easily light up in the darkness without struggling.Our lamps are patented with a classic and elegant design, providing you with unique beauty and elegance.Our table lamp has three levels of dimming brightness, which can meet the different environmental needs of feeding, reading, and office.Our table lamp is equipped with fast-charging USB A and USB C ports (5V/2.1A) and an AC outlet (120V) for your convenience, no more worries about insufficient charging sockets!If your table lamp has any defect or stops working within 3 years, we help you troubleshoot or send a whole new product.

Eye-friendly table lamp Upgrade to an eye-friendly Living room lamps with a wider shade and taller frame that eliminates glare, reduces visual fatigue, and enhances visual acuity. This lamp provides a brighter, wider, and more comfortable workspace compared to mini lamps, improving productivity and creating a pleasant environment.

3-way Dimmable Touch Table Lamp Illuminate your life with effortless control. With a simple touch to any metal part of the lamp body, you can turn it on or off without having to fumble around in the dark. Perfect for the elderly and children. And with adjustable brightness, you can customize the perfect light for any situation.

3-way Dimmable Touch Table Lamp Illuminate your life with effortless control. With a simple touch to any metal part of the lamp body, you can turn it on or off without having to fumble around in the dark. Perfect for the elderly and children. And with adjustable brightness, you can customize the perfect light for any situation.

Protect your eyes with Lynnoland's Flicker-Free Table Lamp. This advanced table lamp provides superior eye protection with its flicker-free technology, adjustable brightness settings, and long-lasting LED lighting. Enjoy a brighter and healthier vision with Lynnoland. Package Included: 2* Grey Lampshades2* Lamp Bases2* 6W LED Bulbs(5000K Natural Light）1* User Manual

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These lamps are beautiful! Excellent quality and very well packaged to arrive perfectly.
reviews.reviewText: I don't usually write a product review but these lamps are beautiful! you won't be disappointed!easy set up, lamp shades are a lovely linen texture, touch control with three levels of light are perfect for bedside.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Stylish. Bright. Love the 3 taps to adjust the brightness. They’re really only 19” but are plenty big enough for a home office. The extra 2” is due to the little twisty cap on top.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what I was looking for.
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. My New narrow rectangle night stands, since I needed new light fixtures. Narrow, easy touch, and 3 levels of brightness.New color of room is needing dark grey and deep blues. These grey shaded touch lamps fit in beautifully.Missing leg shade piece, but, no big deal. It has tension holding it in place. The bulbs are classy and work nicely. The brightness isn't 'even' between the 3 levels, but, it is no worry for my bedtime. Still bright enough to see into my dark closet, and low enough to keep my evening mellow.Packaged nicely. The shades were kept safely rectangle. Easy assembly.Have not tried extra usb charging or a/c ports, yet. Will update if something negative comes up. Otherwise, works as expected.The instructions are solid. But, one needs to read them! I assembled without reading the instructions because it was easy enough. And I noticed the lamp shade center post holder was off center and diagonal. That concerned me, and I took a picture. And then I read the instructions, and I found out it's movable. So, yes, the lamp shade center post of the wire is movable. Do not send it back or get all Angry until you adjust it for real.I'm happy with these lamps.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Surprisingly, good quality
reviews.reviewText: These lamps are extremely stylish, and the quality is surprisingly good. They are packed exceptionally well into the one box and very easy to assemble. They look great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small Footprint, Bright Light
reviews.reviewText: Very easy assembly. Small footprint on nightstand, and easy touch-to-light function. Also nice USB and AC outlets, perfect for watch or phone charger. Only USB, not USB-C outlet. Otherwise, good value for the $.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice and Bright
reviews.reviewText: I bought these to replace lamps I bought a couple years ago that were not as bright as I had hoped. I love the touch to turn them on feature. These are nice ad bright when put on the highest setting and work great for a bedside reading lamp and they look so sleek and modern. Perfect size for my nightstands.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent customer service!
reviews.reviewText: The lamps arrived damaged (looked to have been someone else’s returned and not properly packaged) The seller responded immediately and replaced the lamps—which are perfect. They are attractive and really like the AC and usb ports.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Their good for the price
reviews.reviewText: Little smaller than I wanted. I don't like the bulbs they come with, they are a daylight bulb I prefer soft white. IF you have them plugged into outlets that have a switch, you can't use the switch to turn them on and off. After about 5 seconds of them being turned off the switch will not turn them back on, that is unless I am doing something wrong! Otherwise you need to leave the switch on, and go to each lamp to touch them to turn them on. In general I like the look, and the usb ports.

reviews.reviewTitle: This is the one to get
reviews.reviewText: I've tried multiple lights from amazon, all with usb ports and at least one outlet. Many of them were disappointing for one reason or another. This set is awesome. the touch on/off works every time and the usb ports are working well so far *knock on wood*. i found some 100w dimmable led bulbs that work great and do not flicker. pleasantly surprised so far.
Very handy and beautiful lamps with access ports to USB and AC plug in.
Taps can be an issue, but still good
We have been enjoying these hotel-like lamps. They work well and are unobtrusive while brightening up corners of our living room. We are glad we bought them.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great lamp, looks good, quite useful to have a USB-C and outlet.
reviews.reviewText: Great lamp, looks good, solid and quality. Touch function is responsive. Very useful to have the USB-C and outlet. Having just one outlet on it is more than enough.I'd advise updated model to have wireless charging, only USB-C and a single power outlet.WARNING: The bulbs are beautiful but FRAGILE! One bulb arrived broken but the company offered excellent customer support.
